post:
I have a BlueVM OVZ $1/MO plan paid Quarterly ($3/QTR) which I have no use for as I have a $10/YR KVM with them. The box is on a great node as I have experienced absolutely zero downtime except for some maintenance reboots, it is on the S3-NY node. Id rather not let good pricing goto waste so if anyone is interested in taking over shoot me a PM (first come first serve) you can take possession of the VPS sometime midweek next week.

vps expires: Nov 16, 2014

![](http://i.imgur.com/yNEpdAA.jpg)
